com.dhemery.os
Interface OSCommand

All Known Subinterfaces:
RunnableCommand
All Known Implementing Classes:
PublishingCommand, RuntimeCommand
public interface OSCommand

Represents command to run on the operating system. The mechanism for invoking the command is left to implementors.

Method Summary
 List<String> arguments()
          The arguments for the command.
 String description()
          A description of the command.
 Map<String,String> environment()
          The map of environment variables to add to the command's execution environment.
 String path()
          The path to the command's executable file.
 

Method Detail

description

String description()
A description of the command. The discription neither affects nor is affected by execution of the command.

path

String path()
The path to the command's executable file. The path is such that invoking it on the command line would run the command.

arguments

List<String> arguments()
The arguments for the command.

environment

Map<String,String> environment()
The map of environment variables to add to the command's execution environment. This map does not include environment variables that will be added by the operating system.
